2001160.name: Exfiltrator: Cyber Stealth Missions
2001160.description:
Exfiltrator: Cyber Stealth Missions features 30+ levels full of retro stealth action. Evade guards, dodge cameras, and solve puzzles to become the ultimate cyber agent.

Your performance will be ranked and rewarded with achievements and unlocks.

Take your training program with you, Exfiltrator: Cyber Stealth Missions features native Steam Deck support!

Features:

  • 30+ levels to master
  • Race against the clock to clear each level with an [S RANK]
  • Unlock skins and extra modes
  • Configurable retro graphics filters for that nostalgic feel

Inspired by early 3D games of the late 90s and early 2000s. Great for speed running and quick play sessions!
